property.name: druid.extensions.pullList
property.description: A comma-separated list of one or more druid extensions to download from maven.

property.name: druid.extensions.repositoryList
property.description: A comma-separated list of maven repositories to download extensions.

property.name: druid.extensions.loadList
property.description: A comma-separated list of one or more druid extensions to load.

property.name: druid.security.extensions.loadList
property.description: A comma-separated list of one or more druid security extensions to load. This property will be set via the kerberos wizard and User will not be allowed to modify this when security is enabled.

property.name: druid.zk.service.host
property.description: zookeeper connection string.

property.name: druid.zk.paths.base
property.description: Base Zookeeper path

property.name: druid.discovery.curator.path
property.description: Services announce themselves under this ZooKeeper path.

property.name: druid.storage.type
property.description: Choices:local, noop, s3, hdfs, c*. The type of deep storage to use.

property.name: druid.storage.storageDirectory
property.description: directory to use as deep storage.

property.name: druid.metadata.storage.connector.password
property.description: Password for the metadata storage data base.

property.name: druid.metadata.storage.connector.user
property.description: Metadata storage user

property.name: druid.metadata.storage.connector.port
property.description: Metadata storage port

property.name: database_name
property.description: Druid Metadata storage database name

property.name: metastore_hostname
property.description: Metadata storage hostname

property.name: druid.metadata.storage.type
property.description: Type of the metadata storage. Note that derby will work only if all the druid node are located within the same node. Use mysql or postgres for distributed mode. mysql installed by ambari is only for development and not suitable for production use cases due to it being not HA

property.name: druid.metadata.storage.connector.connectURI
property.description: Metadata storage connector url

property.name: druid.hadoop.security.kerberos.principal
property.description: Kerberos principal e.g druid@EXAMPLE.COM

property.name: druid.hadoop.security.kerberos.keytab
property.description: Kerberos keytab location

property.name: druid.emitter
property.description: Emitter used to emit metrics. Values - "noop", "logging", "ambari-metrics", or "http" will initialize one of the emitter modules.

property.name: druid.emitter.ambari-metrics.hostname
property.description: Timeline host

property.name: druid.emitter.ambari-metrics.port
property.description: Timeline port

property.name: druid.emitter.ambari-metrics.protocol
property.description: Timeline protocol(http or https)

property.name: druid.emitter.ambari-metrics.trustStorePath
property.description: Location of the trust store file.

property.name: druid.emitter.ambari-metrics.trustStoreType
property.description: Optional. Default value is "jks".

property.name: druid.emitter.ambari-metrics.trustStorePassword
property.description: Password to open the trust store file.

property.name: druid.emitter.ambari-metrics.eventConverter
property.description: Password to open the trust store file.

property.name: druid.monitoring.monitors
property.description: Password to open the trust store file.
